DOC.brief_summary: Noninvasive ventilation use preterm newborn respiratory distress syndrome attempt assist failure extubation . The investigator investigate failure extubation infant gestational age less equal 34 week weights less equal 1500 gram . Neonates randomized noninvasive modality support . 101 newborn include study three group , group 1 : Nasal Intermittent Positive Pressure Ventilation ( NIPPV ) ( n=36 ) , group 2 : Nasal Continuous Positive Airway Pressure Bubble ( NCPAP bubble ) ( n=33 ) group 3 : Nasal Continuous Positive Airway Pressure Bubble Ventilator ( NCPAP ventilator ) ( n=32 )
DOC.brief_title: Successful Extubation Noninvasive Ventilation Preterm ≤ 1500g Terms
DOC.detailed_description: The infant randomly allocate extubation use list computer-generated randomization NIPPV mode ( follow setting : positive inspiratory pressure ( PIP ) < 16 centimeter water ( cm H2O ) , positive end-expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) 4-5 centimeter water ( cm H2O , backup respiratory rate ( RR ) < 18 cycle per minute flow 6-7 liter per minute ( L / min ) inspiratory time ( TI ) accord time constant idae ( 0.30 0.34 second ) , respirator seal NCPAP water tower adjust 4-5 centimeter water ( cm H2O ) PEEP , flow 6-7 liter per minute ( L / Min . ) oxygen adjust maintain arterial oxygen saturation 85-95 % The criterion extubation define use protocol clinic staff , confirm arterial blood gas chest X-ray , well adjustment ventilator setting . Vital sign , blood gas parameter noninvasive bracket record , immediately , 15 , 30 , 45 minute , 1 ( hour ) h , 2h , 12h , 24h 48 h extubation document . Neonatal morbidity document discharge , among : patent ductus arterious , necrotizing enterocolitis , retinopathy prematurity , intracranial hemorrhage pneumothorax . Data achievement prenatal , antenatal steroid surfactant administration document . All newborns natural porcine surfactant Curosurf® . The total duration mechanical ventilation oxygen document birth discharge death . The supplemental oxygen mechanical ventilation day define daily requirement fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO 2 ) > 0.21 ventilation > 12 hour , respectively . The newborn follow interaction discharge ( 5 week ) .
DOC.criteria: Were eligible study Newborn ( NB ) ≤ 34 week 500g weight ≤ 1500 grams diagnosis respiratory distress syndrome ( RDS ) first elective extubation . Excluded patient cardiorespiratory system malformation Genetic disorder Neuromuscular disease malformation central nervous system .
